PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_CableCarrierSegmentTypeCableTrunkingSegment
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: An enclosed carrier segment with one or more compartments into which cables are placed.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalLength
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal length of the segment.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal width of the segment

PropertyDef.Name: NominalHeight
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal height of the segment

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfCompartments
PropertyDef.Definition: The number of separate internal compartments within the trunking
